metadata.synopsis: Single dialog for one of the guards in front of the Private Room. Only if the other guard is defeated.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill or knock-out the guard S_LOW_Elfsong_FlamingFist_001_990ad029-d291-4788-86f9-dfceacdf771c and later make click on   S_LOW_Elfsong_FlamingFist_002_971f5890-e0ae-49ef-9a04-5e69ebdf8159

0.speaker: Fist Aguta
0.text: Still here, troublemaker? I told you to leave.

1.speaker: Fist Aguta
1.text: I just lost my patrol partner, and I've got no patience for talk. Get out of here.
